mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO franchisee ( franchisee_no, franchisee_crn, franchisee_name, franchisee_phone, owner_no) SELECT franchisee_no, franchisee_crn, franchisee_name, franchisee_phone, owner_no FROM unverified_franchisee
WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_crn as franchiseeCrn, franchisee_name as franchiseeName, franchisee_phone as franchiseePhone, owner_no as ownerNo
FROM unverified_franchisee LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM franchisee_faq
faq_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, customer_no as customerNo, qna_type as qnaType, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_question as qnaQuestion, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, qna_date as qnaDate, customer_mail as customerMail FROM franchisee_qna WHERE qna_no = #{qnaNo}

SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, customer_no as customerNo, qna_type as qnaType, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_question as qnaQuestion, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, qna_date as qnaDate FROM franchisee_qna LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback( feedback_board_title, feedback_board_content, feedback_board_date ) VALUES ( #{feedBackBoardTitle}, #{feedBackBoardContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT feedback_board_no as feedBackBoardNo, feedback_board_title as feedBackBoardTitle, feedback_board_content as feedBackBoardContent, feedback_board_date as feedBackBoardDate FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_board_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT feedback_board_no as feedBackBoardNo, feedback_board_title as feedBackBoardTitle, feedback_board_content as feedBackBoardContent, feedback_board_date as feedBackBoardDate FROM feedback WHERE feedback_board_no = #{feedBackBoardNo}
